description: This file contains CSS styles and variables for managing themes in a front-end application, primarily focused on light and dark themes.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container that sets the primary styles and theme for the application.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style for the logo image, including animation and sizing properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Style for the application header, defining layout and presentation properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Style for application links, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Style for the theme toggle button, including positioning and hover effects.
